      • abs

        public static double[] abs(double[] re,
                           double[] im)
        Calculates the absolute value of a complex input. The absolute value of a+ib is sqrt(a^2+b^2)
        Parameters:
        re - The real part of the complex input
        im - The imaginary part of the complex input
        Returns:
        The absolute value of the complex input
